parties.member_definition: Individual or entity purchasing a membership

sections.title: Relationship to Terms & Conditions
content: This Membership Access Agreement is incorporated into and governed by the Sandlot Picks Terms & Conditions.
By purchasing or using a membership, the Member agrees to both this Agreement and the Terms & Conditions.
In the event of a conflict, the Terms & Conditions shall control.

sections.title: Services Provided
content: Sandlot Picks provides sports analytics, data-driven insights, predictive modeling, and related educational content for informational and educational purposes only.
Sandlot Picks does not operate a sportsbook, place bets, or guarantee outcomes.
All gambling risk disclosures and legal compliance obligations are governed by the Terms & Conditions.

subsections.title: Monthly Membership
terms: Access valid only during active billing period
Automatically renews unless canceled before renewal date

subsections.title: Seasonal Membership
terms: One-time payment for defined sports season
Access expires at end of season
No automatic renewal unless stated at purchase

subsections.title: Lifetime Membership
terms: Access valid for lifetime of the Sandlot Picks Platform
Lifetime refers to the platform, not the Member
Features may evolve, change, or be discontinued

sections.title: Account Access & Use
content: Memberships are personal and non-transferable
Credential sharing is prohibited
Members are responsible for account security
Sandlot Picks may suspend or terminate access for violations

sections.title: Payments, Billing & Renewals
content: All prices are listed in U.S. dollars unless stated otherwise
Payments are processed through third-party payment processors
Members authorize recurring charges where applicable
Monthly memberships automatically renew unless canceled

sections.title: Refunds & Cancellations
content: Refunds and cancellations are governed exclusively by the Terms & Conditions
Monthly memberships are non-refundable
Seasonal memberships are non-refundable once access has begun
Lifetime memberships are non-refundable under all circumstances
No refunds for partial use, downtime, or dissatisfaction

sections.title: Prohibited Use
content: Unlawful use of the Services is prohibited
Sharing, reselling, or sublicensing access is prohibited
Scraping or reverse engineering data or models is prohibited
Automated access without authorization is prohibited
Using data to create competing services is prohibited

sections.title: Intellectual Property
content: All content and materials are owned by Sandlot Picks or its licensors
Membership does not grant ownership or commercial rights
Content is protected by intellectual property laws

sections.title: Modifications to Services
content: Sandlot Picks may modify, suspend, or discontinue features
Features may be added, removed, or replaced
Lifetime Members acknowledge that features may evolve

sections.title: Termination
content: Memberships may be terminated for violations, abuse, fraud, or legal compliance
Termination does not relieve obligations under the Terms & Conditions
No refunds will be issued for termination for cause

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Liability limitations are governed by the Terms & Conditions
Total liability shall not exceed the amount paid in the preceding 12 months or $100, whichever is less

sections.title: Governing Law
content: This Agreement is governed by the laws specified in the Terms & Conditions

sections.title: Acceptance
content: By purchasing or using a membership, the Member agrees to this Agreement and the Terms & Conditions
